title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Sampler\QpsSampler
name: QpsSampler
description: This implementation of the SamplerInterface uses a cache to limit sampling to the a certain number of queries per second. It requires a PSR-6 cache implementation.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description:
Create a new QpsSampler. If the provided cache is shared between servers, the queries per second will be counted across servers. If the cache is shared between servers and you wish to sample independently on the servers, provide your own cache key that is different on each server.

There may be race conditions between simultaneous requests where they may both (all) be sampled.

params.name: options.cacheItemClass
params.description: The class of the item to use. This class must implement CacheItemInterface.

params.name: options.rate
params.description: The number of queries per second to allow. Must be less than or equal to 1. Defaults to 0.1

methods.name: shouldSample
methods.description: Returns whether or not the request should be sampled.
